availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Kennedy (Nicholas County, Kentucky, teacher and farmer.)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, teacher and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Kennedy and Elizabeth Kennedy. Married to Caroline Stoker Kennedy in Nicholas County, Kentucky, in February 1854. Father of Hansan Kennedy and Ollie Kennedy. Teacher in Nicholas County in 1850. Famer in Nicholas County in 1860. Employed William Fuller as a laborer in Nicholas County in 1860. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 406A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 2, p. 413.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, Precinct 2, p. 217A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nicholas County Marriages, Film 000252408.
